LibreTranslateCaching.description: Boolean. Whether to enable caching for translation subpages.

LibreTranslateCachingTime.description: Integer. The time in seconds to cache translations for.

LibreTranslateRobotPolicy.description: String. The robot policy to use for translation subpages.

LibreTranslateSuppressLanguageCaption.description: Boolean. Whether to suppress (disable) the language caption on translation subpages.

LibreTranslateTimeout.description: Integer. The time in seconds before connecting to the LibreTranslate instance will timeout.

LibreTranslateTranslateTitle.description: Boolean. Whether to also translate the page title. This will create an extra request to the translation API.

LibreTranslateUrl.description: String. URL of the LibreTranslate instance to use.
